name: lib/DrawrCanvas.js
mouseupListener
description: listener to finishing draw on canvas

name: DrawrCanvas
description: Class to do rendering and get user inputs from drawr drawing solution

params.name: divId
params.description: div where canvas should be created

name: _addClick
description: add and draw changes to canvas

params.name: dragging
params.description: if point should be connected to last one

name: _getLastLocalClick
description: get index of last click made by local user

params.name: index
params.description: index from where to start looking

return.description: index - last local index from given click

params.name: hard
params.description: if true, clears and rescale canvas, and redraws all clicks

name: addImage
description: add image to canvas at given coordinates

name: setZoom
description: set new zoom level and calls redraw

params.name: listener
params.description: function to be executed on event

name: getAllClicks
description: gets all clicks drawn on canvas

return.description: clicks - all clicks on canvas instance

name: lib/DrawrClient.js
onWebSocketError
description: error handling if websocket fails to connect

name: onWebSocketOpen
description: emit event when websocket connection is open

name: onWebSocketClose
description: emit event when websocket connection is closed by the server

name: DrawrClient
description: Class to comunicate with the drawr backend

name: constructor
description: creates a new server connection instance

params.name: listener
params.description: function to be executed on event

name: joinSession
description: join an existing session via session id

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} p - resolve/rejects after http request result

params.name: sessionId
params.description: id of the session to join

return.description: p - resolve/rejects after http request result

name: newSession
description: creates a new session with given name

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} p - resolve/rejects after http request result

return.description: p - resolve/rejects after http request result

name: getSessionId
description: get session ID from connected session

unknown.tagValue: {Array} usersList - array with all users connected to session

return.description: usersList - array with all users connected to session

name: sendCanvasUpdate
description: send canvas click updates to websocket connection
